# Globals.PlotFunction method

Plot a function

```csharp
public void PlotFunction(Func<double, double> function, double start, double end, double step, 
    string title)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| function | Function to plot |
| start | start point for the plot |
| end | end point for the plot |
| step | step size |
| title | Title to associate to function |
